creator: TacSou
descriptionHtml:
Play the well-known Moroccan card game Hez2 on your smartphone today! You can play it casually offline against one or more AI opponents, or you can challenge your friends and play against them online. You can play with up to 3 players (4 players in total).

Hez 2 is played using the Spanish card deck known as Carta, which consists of 40 cards divided into 4 types: Espadas (swords), Oros (golds), Copas (cups), and Bastos (sticks).
The rules are different from the card game Ronda but are very simple. To win in this game (the primary objective), you have to be the first player who empties their hand from all cards.

Features:
♤ Offline mode: play against one or more AI opponents
♤ Online mode: play against your friends over the internet
♤ Emojis to interact with your friends
♤ Customizable items
♤ FREE and simple game
